message: I propose a 90/10 split. It's a fair starting point, considering the inflation rate affects you more than me.
I propose a 60/40 split. It's more balanced considering the inflation impacts on both of us.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need a larger share to make up for the inflation hitting me harder. Let's aim for a 70/30 split this time.
